title: Information Technology-integrated Problem-based Leadership Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary education management experience
context.additional_context: Capacity development for corporate elementary education administrators to effectively integrate information technology in real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can design lessons using software tools to solve social problems occurring in actual educational settings
Learners can produce multimedia educational materials that enhance learner engagement through problem-based learning activities
Learners can improve information technology integration strategies suitable for corporate training environments by incorporating peer evaluation and feedback

resources: Educational software licenses (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)
Problem scenario template and assessment rubric

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
